refbody.section: PurposeList files on the flash drive that are not in the firmware manifest. Files in this list generally were created by something other than a firmware installation. This command is intended to help find errant files if the flash drive runs unexpectedly low on free space.

dlentry.dd: Directory to exclude from output list

refbody.section: ExampleList files on the flash drive that are not in the firmware manifest, excluding any in the /opt/ibm/ and /etc/bedrock directories.Console> show extraneousFiles /opt/ibm /etc/bedrock Locations of extraneous files on the system... /firmware.xml (3227940 bytes) /var/run/utmp (2688 bytes) ...
Information for consumers onlyThis command is a hidden command, meant for internal use only. It should not be revealed to end customers.
